com.flir.thermalsdk.image

Class ThermalValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flir.thermalsdk.image.ThermalValue

  • public class ThermalValue
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an Thermal value with additional state information. It is used to obtain Thermal data from ThermalImage or any MeasurementShape added to the image.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ThermalValueState state
      The state of the image at the point where the temperature is measured.
      TemperatureUnit unit
      Temperature unit.
      double value
      Measured temperature.
